Portfolio / Al Jazira Bank
Corporate Video 2024

Al Jazira Bank Corporate Video Production

Do You Know Why I Deal with Bank Al Jazira?.

Scroll to explore

Client

Al Jazira Bank

Industry

Banking & Finance

Services

Video Production, Brand Storytelling, Corporate Communication

Year

2024

Project Overview

A human-centered corporate film designed to capture real customer motivations and forge deep emotional connections with the bank's brand and values â€” crafted through insightful concept development, compelling scriptwriting, and thoughtful creative direction

The Challenge

01

The challenge was to create a corporate video that moved beyond typical financial advertising. The goal was to build a narrative that felt authentic and relatable, showcasing the bank's relationship with its customers from their own perspective.

The Creative Solution

02

The solution was a film titled
'Do You Know Why I Deal with Bank Al Jazira?'

By focusing on genuine customer stories and their motivations, the film created an emotional narrative that highlighted the trust and personal connection customers feel with the bank, making the brand more human and approachable.

Video Production

See the behind-the-scenes and final production of the Al Jazira Bank corporate video
